attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we think the goverment should bring cannabis into the medical system,
cannabis does not cause lung cancer(dr tashkin federal researcher on cannabis for 30years)...using marijuana medicine can and will cure most health problems ranging from pain to cancer...

we think safe medicine is better than chemical medicine...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
